user_query: astrodynamics tell them what you just told me I can get them back to Mars by Sol 561 how could you stand right there for me please right there quick Oh could you stand like right okay let's pretend that this stapler is the Hermes and you are sorry what's your name Teddy I'm the director of NASA cool Teddy you're right now the Hermes is headed toward you starting its month-long deceleration instead but instead what I'm proposing is start accelerating immediately to preserve velocity and gain even more we don't intercept with Earth at all but we come close enough to get a gravity assist and of course while we're doing resupply with the probe the flying ship pick up whatever provisions we need and now we're accelerating towards mind your March now we're going too fast at this point to fall into orbit but we can do a flyby we could supply Watney if we can't get one thing else to surface they would intercept using the MAV and then we'll just head home I've done math checks out

entities.entity_description: Teddy는 NASA의 국장으로, 우주 임무의 의사결정에 관여하는 인물이다
Watney는 화성에 고립되어 구조를 기다리는 우주비행사 캐릭터이다
NASA는 영화 속에서 우주 임무를 관장하는 기관이다

relationships.relationship_description: Hermes 우주선이 Watney를 구조하기 위한 임무에 사용된다
Teddy는 Hermes의 임무 계획에 대한 브리핑을 받고 있다
